articles.title: How 'good' bacteria can help corals survive the deadly ocean heat - Free Press Journal
articles.description: Treating corals with a probiotic cocktail of beneficial bacteria increases survival after a bleaching event, according to new research by King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST).
